Doctor Evidence - Meet with our team at ISPOR
Meet with our team! Don't miss the opportunity to learn about our products
Dear,
Doctor Evidence LLC is a leading human-enabled technology company in Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM). Doctor Evidenceâ€™s leading-edge solutions provide dynamic platforms for clients across the healthcare ecosystem to review, synthesize and evaluate evidence-based medicine. Doctor Evidence has been used for the past 14 years by life-science companies, academic institutions, evidence-based practice centers, and leading healthcare providers in the marketplace to make timely, relevant and cost-effective evidence-based decisions.
We will be attending this years ACR/ARHP Annual Meeting in San Diego. Don't miss the opportunity to meet with our team and learn about our new product ASCO DOC Search. Please visit our website to read the press release at Doctor Evidence
